name: Per2Team1
description:
Use your bluetooth hose to spray down thieves as they try to break into your neighbors houses, you can upgrade the hose by going into the shop and spending gold. Pick up a power up to turn on the street lights removing the robbers briefly.

To get coins you spray enough water at the robber, doing so will result in you getting coins. There is no ending and the game gets harder and harder with robbers spawning more frequently .

Controls:

 Hold shift to sprint

Hold right click near the fire hydrant to refill your hose

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

ESC to open the menu

(Press ww, ss, ad, ad, qe, spacebar to gain a lot of coins in an instant)
